title: Arve Rezzle: Kikaijikake no Yousei-tachi
synopsis: One day, when Remu Mikage is on a video call with his sister, Shiki, who has traveled to the futuristic Okinotori-island Mega Float City for school, she confesses that both the audio and visuals of her are completely artificial. In order to be more efficient in her studies, Shiki has used neural-linked nanomachines to upload her consciousness onto a computer and is storing her physical body in a "body pool." While shocked, Remu is supportive of his sister's decision, until the disaster known as the "Early Rapture" happens.
related_anime: ['Arve Rezzle: Kikaijikake no Yousei-tachi', 'Death Billiards', 'Ryo', 'Little Witch Academia']
